title: Priyanka Chopra looks chic as she joins husband Nick Jonas for Jonas Brothers' after party in LA
text:
She rang in her first Karwa Chauth at a Jonas Brothers concert in San Diego last week.

And Priyanka Chopra supported her husband Nick Jonas once again as they headed to an after party for his band held at Craig's, in Los Angeles, California, on Monday night.

The Baywatch star, 37, looked effortlessly chic as she showcased her sensational figure in a red silk wrap dress.

Smitten: Priyanka Chopra supported her husband Nick Jonas once again as they headed to an after party for his band held at Craig's, in Los Angeles, California, on Monday night

Putting on a leggy display in the item of clothing, Priyanka teamed the look with a pair of stylish suede knee-high heeled boots.

The Quantico star accessorised her outfit with a miniature crocodile print clutch bag and a diamond pendant necklace.

Priyanka styled her luscious brunette locks into a curly blow-dried hairdo, she added a slick of make-up which included a bold red lipstick to match her dress.

Meanwhile her husband Nick, who has been busy touring with his band Jonas Brothers, looked dapper in a blue coloured trouser suit.

Loved-up: The Baywatch star, 37, looked effortlessly chic as she showcased her sensational figure in a red silk wrap dress

Details: Putting on a leggy display in the item of clothing, Priyanka teamed the look with a pair of stylish suede knee-high heeled boots

Dapper: Meanwhile her husband Nick, who has been busy touring with his band Jonas Brothers, looked dapper in a blue coloured trouser suit

He teamed his look with a matching coloured knitted jumper and a pair of black loafers for a stylish finish.

The couple, who tied the knot in December 2018, looked loved-up as they walked hand-in-hand to the after party.

Also attending the after party were Nick's brother and bandmates, Joe and Kevin Jonas, with the latter joined by his wife Danielle.



Impressive: The singer was seen getting into a lavish sports car after the star-studded party

Stylish: Also attending the after party was Nick's brother and bandmate Kevin Jonas and his wife Danielle

Brother: The couple were closely followed by fellow brother and bandmate Joe Jonas who headed to the eatery with them for the after party

Smile: Joe was bombarded by fans as he stopped to take a selfie with one person who waited outside the eatery

It comes after Nick gushed over Priyanka on Wednesday as she rang in her first Karwa Chauth at a Jonas Brothers concert in San Diego.

Karwa Chauth is a Hindu holiday in which married women fast from sunrise until moonrise for their husbands' long lives.

In recent years some couples have adjusted to the changing times by having both spouses keep the fast, but Nick did not say whether he did so.

Smitten: Kevin looked handsome in a pair of black skinny jeans and a sparkly patterned bomber jacket

Racy: Danielle showcased her toned figure in a pair of high-waisted leather trousers with an animal print crop top

Home time: Joe was seen heading home as he got into a car with several of his pals after his concert

He shared a heartwarming Instagram album of him and Priyanka goofing around and mugging for the camera while modelling stylish Indian clothes.

'My wife is Indian. She is Hindu, and she is incredible in every way. She has taught me so much about her culture and religion,' he wrote.

Priyanka's new husband added: 'I love and admire her so much, and as you can see we have fun together. Happy Karva Chauth to everyone!'

Sweet: It comes after Nick gushed over Priyanka on Wednesday as she rang in her first Karwa Chauth at a Jonas Brothers concert in San Diego

The Bollywood star modelled a glamorous sari in red and gold, the colours traditionally associated with Hindu bridal attire.

She had both Christian and Hindu weddings with Nick in Jodhpur last year and for the latter, she wore a sumptuous red and gold number by the highly regarded Indian fashion designer Sabyasachi Mukherji.

Priyanka also shared the snaps to her own Instagram, captioning them: 'Karwa chauth at a @jonasbrothers concert. Definitely a first I’ll always remember! ❤️ @nickjonas #karwachauth.'
